review: My main reason for getting a Chromecast was to get HBO Go on my TV, the Xbox One app is apparently dragging its feet and I put the 360 away.  To this end it works very well, the Xbox has the necessary close USB ports to power it and I don't have to take up another HDMI port on my home theatre system.  Looking forward to more support fo this thing.
author: M. Pfaff

review: The product does not what do what they lead you to believe it does.#1--It DOES NOT mirror your ipad.#2-Google chrome on the iPad does not mirror  to the TV.#3-Most of the apps on the Ipad are not compatible with the device. ( eg Amazon Prime does not work )It does mirror your browser. ONLY ON A PC, not an Ipad or Iphone.If you are looking for a device that will mirror the Ipad or android, look at EZCAST. Have not bought one yet so I cannot tell you if it works or not. But they claim to be able to do all the things Chromecast does and everything else you want it to do.  Good luck

review: One of the big reasons I purchased this was to stream content from any of my Android devices chrome browser's as opposed to just using my home computer(because anyone can plug in an HDMI cord to their tv for internet content). However, it seems that is only the case for a few apps, and the mobile chrome browser isn't supported at all currently... Until Google decides to actually support Chrome for Chromecast, this device is just a gimmick.
